casebody.data:
170 A.3d 289 BELL AND BON SECOURS HOSPITAL v. CHANCE Pet. Docket No. 145,

Sept.Term, 2017

Court of Appeals of Maryland. September 12, 2017

Opinion of the Court of Special Appeals unreported (No. 2259, Sept.Term, 2014). Transferred to the regular docket as No. 36, Sept.Term, 2017.

Petition for writ of certiorari granted
